issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Dafault appearance of the screen is changed on device rotation.In portrait mode, screen shows one full view and a bit of second view but while in landscape mode, screen shows one view at a time.
This is not regression. This issue occurs since 1.8.2

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink> Base UI > Views > Scroll views > Scrollable View w/o Clipping.
2. Observe the screen.
3. Rotate the screen to landscape.

Expected Result 
The appearance of the screen should be same in both directions.

Actual:
The appearance of the screen is different in portrait and landscape directions. Please find the screenshots attached.
fields.summary: iOS: ScrollViews - Default appearance of the screen is changed on device rotation.
fields.environment:
Tested with SDK: 2.1.0.v20120612170248
Tested with Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206111802
Device: iPhone 3GS (v 5.0.1), iPhone simulator
OS: Mac OSX Version 10.7.3

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
